attributes.contentHtml:
First, downtime is something we already know, and in that I agree. Freenom's domain is because right now we don't have much money for normal domains. I don't take care of that. We made legal information, it is in # ðŸ“œâ”ƒtos. We also have # ðŸ“œâ”ƒprivacy-policy. So don't lie. We do not give the url of the node since we mostly host Discord bots, and you don't need the url at all. If you need it, we give it to you, but we do not give it by default.
I give you reason about downtime, but drama.gg post for that ... @Ricardo

attributes.title: NexusNodes.tk | 90% Downtime - No TOS & Privacy Policy - Using .tk domain
